title: Cognitive Science-Based Statistical Practice Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Process where students perform data analysis projects in virtual lab environments using personal devices, receiving real-time feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can select appropriate statistical techniques and design analysis processes with over 80% accuracy in VR simulations using real industrial data.
Learners can create infographics that effectively convey analysis results using data visualization tools in simulation environments.
Learners can provide at least three cognitive feedbacks on peers' analysis results through a peer review system.

resources: VR Content License for Statistics Practice

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
